short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jobenu allows users to save job details with a single click after applying.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Jobenu simplifies the job application process, providing job seekers with an easy and efficient way to manage their applications. By automatically extracting job details and storing them in a centralized database, Jobenu helps you stay organized and focused on landing your dream job.

Features:

• One-Click Save: After applying for a job, save all the job details with a single click.
• Automatic Extraction: Jobenu automatically extracts and stores job information, ensuring accuracy and convenience.
• User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive design that makes tracking your applications a breeze.
• Data Control: Users have full control over their application data, with options to export, clear, or request their data at any time.

How It Works:

• Add the Jobenu extension to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
• Apply for jobs on your favorite job boards and company websites.
• Click the Jobenu icon in your browser toolbar to save the job details automatically.
• Jobenu extracts job information such as job title, company name, application date, and job description.
• Access your Jobenu dashboard to view, edit, and organize your saved job applications.

Get Started Today:

Download Jobenu and take control of your job search. With Jobenu, managing your job applications has never been easier.

!!!! Note: As Jobenu is currently in its beta version, users are limited to extracting details for up to 5 jobs per day. If you need more, please contact us.
